data.name: Terrakion

attacks.name: Sacred Sword
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Sacred Sword during your next turn.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.

data.name: Terrakion-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Rock Tumble
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Pump-up Smash
attacks.text: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your hand to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

data.name: Terrakion

attacks.name: Retaliate
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during his or her last turn, this attack does 60 more damage.

data.flavorText: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.

data.name: Terrakion

attacks.name: Retaliate
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during his or her last turn, this attack does 60 more damage.

data.flavorText: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.

data.name: Terrakion

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.text: Each of this Pokémon's attacks does 50 more damage to Darkness Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Crushing Blow
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.

data.name: Terrakion

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Earthen Power
attacks.text: If you have a Stadium in play, this attack does 80 more damage.

data.flavorText: It has phenomenal power. It will mercilessly crush anyone or anything that bullies small Pokémon.

data.name: Terrakion

attacks.name: Retaliate
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during his or her last turn, this attack does 60 more damage.

data.flavorText: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.

attacks.name: Cavern Counter
attacks.text: If all of your Benched Pokémon have at least 1 damage counter on them, this attack does 150 more damage.

data.flavorText: This extremely rare Pokémon is a different color than usual. It is very hard to find.

data.name: Terrakion

attacks.name: Cavern Tackle
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from attacks done to this Pokémon. If 1 of your Pokémon used Cavern Tackle during your last turn, this attack can't be used.

data.flavorText: It has phenomenal power. It will mercilessly crush anyone or anything that bullies small Pokémon.
